title: PURE Clarifies the Value in Locking Up Primary Debtholder to Stave Off Dilution
text:
LAS VEGAS, August. 14, 2015 /PR Buzz/ -- Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc. , (OTC: PNOW ) released an announcement this morning , “ Pure Hospitality Sequesters Largest Debt Holder to Stave off Dilution ,” stating that the Company’s primary debtholder submitted to a ‘Lock-Up’ agreement, with the assistance of an outside investment firm, which prevents the debtholder from selling any of their debt to third parties – in a move to dramatically stave off dilution.
The Company later released this blog to provide further clarity and insight on this move:
Read the blog here: http://www.purenow.solutions/the-pnow-lock-up/
As Mr. Pereira stated in his Shareholder Address , “the Company anticipates up-listing to a higher exchange and exiting the murky waters of the Pink Sheet marketplace. As Pure Hospitality retires its legacy debt, the Company expects to more rapidly clean the balance sheets and greatly minimize the number of note holders. The Company also anticipates this change being reflected on the 3rd quarter financial filings.”
Mr. Pereira is certainly keeping to that promise!
So, management suggests that shareholders seriously prepare themselves for a very promising beta test launch of Oveedia, taking comfort in knowing that Pure Hospitality Solutions is are doing everything possible to assure every investor that PURE’s success reflects where it matters most.\
About Pure Hospitality Solutions, Inc.
PURE provides proprietary technology, marketing solutions and branding services to hotel operators and condominium owners. The Company's vision is to build competitive operations in the areas of (i) online marketing and hotel internet booking engine services,
(ii) hotel branding and, (iii) own, operate and in some instances develop, boutique hotels under the new, "by PURE" brand.
